body_html:
Current update:
TF version shown as 1.3 in log (Master branch from GitHub on Sep 1 / 2017, head on commit a2e1a5e)
app build at Android Studio 2.3.3 on Linux Ubuntu 16.04
app tested on Meizu M2 Note (Android 5.1, API 22)

With useCamera2API = true TF Detect works with both nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake' and nativeBuildSystem = 'none' (i.e. with Java and native implementation of YUV to RGB transformation: convertYUV420ToARGB8888).

With useCamera2API = false TF Detect doesn't work with either nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake' and nativeBuildSystem = 'none' (Java implementation of YUV to RGB transformation convertYUV420SPToARGB8888 used from #12622 ).
Pressing the volume keys on a device doesn't toggle debug visualizations on/off.
App also doesn't produce any additional errors in the log:
TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_false.txt
For comparison log of working TF Detect with useCamera2API = true and nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake':
TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_true.txt

app build at Android Studio 2.3.3 on Linux Ubuntu 16.04
app tested on Meizu M2 Note (Android 5.1, API 22)
With useCamera2API = true TF Detect works with both nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake' and nativeBuildSystem = 'none' (i.e. with Java and native implementation of YUV to RGB transformation: convertYUV420ToARGB8888).
With useCamera2API = false TF Detect doesn't work with either nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake' and nativeBuildSystem = 'none' (Java implementation of YUV to RGB transformation convertYUV420SPToARGB8888 used from #12622 ).
Pressing the volume keys on a device doesn't toggle debug visualizations on/off.
App also doesn't produce any additional errors in the log:
TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_false.txt
For comparison log of working TF Detect with useCamera2API = true and nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake':
TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_true.txt
body:
Current update: 
TF version shown as 1.3 in log (Master branch from GitHub on Sep 1 / 2017, head on commit a2e1a5e0985d8d2c1ec3a3f246dad214600af21c)
app build at Android Studio 2.3.3 on Linux Ubuntu 16.04
app tested on Meizu M2 Note (Android 5.1, API 22)

With `useCamera2API = true` TF Detect works with both `nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake'` and `nativeBuildSystem = 'none'` (i.e. with Java and native implementation of YUV to RGB transformation: `convertYUV420ToARGB8888`).

With `useCamera2API = false` TF Detect doesn't work with either `nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake'` and `nativeBuildSystem = 'none'` (Java implementation of YUV to RGB transformation `convertYUV420SPToARGB8888` used from #12622 ).
 Pressing the volume keys on a device doesn't toggle debug visualizations on/off.
App also doesn't produce any additional errors in the log:
[TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_false.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1272377/TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_false.txt)
For comparison log of working TF Detect with `useCamera2API = true` and `nativeBuildSystem = 'cmake'`:
[TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_true.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1272382/TFDetect_log_cmake_CameraAPI2_true.txt)
